oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The World of Organic Agriculture: Regulations and Certification: Emerging Trends 2008
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Huber, Beate
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Regulation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This paper presents the most important facts about the current issues related to organic standards, regulations, and certification.
